title: SisTech Manufacturing Expands Services: Leading Precision in Electronic Manufacturing
description: SisTech Manufacturing, known for its expertise in precision electronic manufacturing services, is expanding what it can do in production. For over 30 years, the company has been recognized for its commitment to quality and its ability to meet the diverse demands of industries like aerospace and consumer electronics. With ISO 9001:2015 certification and ITAR registration, […]
content:
SisTech Manufacturing, known for its expertise in precision electronic manufacturing services, is expanding what it can do in production. For over 30 years, the company has been recognized for its commitment to quality and its ability to meet the diverse demands of industries like aerospace and consumer electronics. With ISO 9001:2015 certification and ITAR registration, SisTech Manufacturing supports a wide range of services such as Printed Circuit Board (PCB) Assembly, conformal coating, testing and inspection, and obsolescence management.

The company is enhancing how it handles printed circuit board assembly, managing each stage from prototype to large-scale production. They utilize Kitted PCB Assembly to speed up projects and improve efficiency. A robust supply chain management system backs this process, easing the workload on clients and letting them focus on their main activities. For more insights on their PCB assembly services and supply chain management, visit SisTech Manufacturing’s website.

Their focus on quality shows through in their thorough testing and inspection services. SisTech Manufacturing uses advanced tools such as optical imaging, automated X-ray with X-Plane CT Scan technology, and functional testing to maintain high product standards. These techniques help detect even minor faults, reassuring clients in fields where precision is crucial.

Brad Kennedy, a representative from the company, highlighted SisTech Manufacturing’s commitment to quality and the recent advancements. “Our dedication to expanding our capabilities reinforces our objective to deliver exceptional precision and reliability to our clients,” Kennedy explained. “We are proud to be a trusted partner for industries that demand the highest standards in electronic manufacturing.”

Beyond expanding production, SisTech Manufacturing is boosting its conformal coating services too. They provide various protective coatings, including UV- and heat-curable options, which keep sensitive electronics in top shape. With acrylic conformal coating, components gain extra protection against environmental elements, ensuring that each assembly remains reliable and lasts longer.

Furthermore, the company has a proactive approach to obsolescence management, which helps reduce the risks linked with the phase-out of electronic components. By monitoring the lifecycle of components and addressing possible End of Life (EOL) issues, SisTech assists clients in avoiding future challenges and keeping their product development on track. More information about their obsolescence management program is available on their official website.

SisTech Manufacturing operates out of a cutting-edge facility in Bend, Oregon, using the latest technology to ensure accuracy, efficiency, and quality. The site, located at 63068 Lower Meadow Drive, signifies the company’s ongoing investment in infrastructure to support its expanded production capabilities and dedication to excellent service.

This dedication is recognized by clients who consistently give SisTech Manufacturing five-star reviews on various platforms. Reviewer M D praised the company’s quality processes, competitive pricing, and effective services. This reflects the overall satisfaction of many customers.

The company is open from 7 am to 3:30 pm, Monday through Friday, providing plenty of time for consultations and service delivery. There’s always someone ready to help by calling SisTech Manufacturing at +1 877-792-2779. For further information about their services and expansion efforts, SisTech Manufacturing’s website acts as a detailed source for both potential and existing clients.

“We are constantly looking to the future, ensuring our customers receive not only high-quality products but also a robust support system to meet their evolving needs,” Kennedy added. “Innovation at SisTech Manufacturing is fueled by our dedication to growth, adaptability, and client satisfaction.”

As SisTech Manufacturing broadens its service offerings and boosts production lines, it continues to lead in precision electronic manufacturing. The company remains committed to tackling the complex needs of various industries with accuracy and dependability. Their growing reputation sets a standard for excellence in the manufacturing sector.
summary: SisTech Manufacturing, known for its expertise in precision electronic manufacturing services, is expanding its production capabilities. The company, which has been recognized for its commitment to quality and ability to meet the demands of industries like aerospace and consumer electronics, is enhancing its services including Printed Circuit Board (PCB) Assembly, conformal coating, testing and inspection, and obsolescence management. They use Kitted PCB Assembly to speed up projects and improve efficiency. Additionally, the company is increasing its conformal coatings, which keep sensitive electronics in top shape. The expansion is part of a broader effort to deliver high-quality products and a robust support system for clients.
shortSummary: SisTech Manufacturing, renowned for its exceptional precision and reliability in electronic manufacturing, is expanding its production capabilities and services, emphasizing quality, efficiency, and sustainability.

As we explore the landscape of electronics manufacturing, we can't overlook SisTech Manufacturing in Bend, Oregon. Known for its innovative solutions and commitment to quality, SisTech provides a range of services from PCB assembly to obsolescence management. Their emphasis on sustainable practices is noteworthy, especially in today's eco-conscious market. However, what sets them apart in this competitive industry? Let's uncover the unique strategies they employ that not only enhance product performance but also position them as a leader in the tech sector.
SisTech Manufacturing stands out as a leading electronics manufacturer in Bend, Oregon, known for its innovative solutions and commitment to quality. We pride ourselves on our dedication to sistech innovation, constantly pushing the boundaries of technology to deliver cutting-edge products. Our team works collaboratively to incorporate the latest advancements, ensuring our clients receive the best in performance and reliability.
Moreover, we recognize the importance of sustainable practices in today's world. By utilizing eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient processes, we minimize our environmental impact while maintaining high production standards. We believe that innovation and sustainability go hand in hand, and we're committed to creating a better future for both our clients and the planet. Together, let's embrace the future of electronics manufacturing.
Building on our commitment to innovation and sustainability, we offer a comprehensive range of Electronic Manufacturing Services (EMS) designed to meet the diverse needs of our clients. Our services streamline the supply chain, ensuring timely delivery and cost efficiency. We specialize in PCB assembly, prototyping, and full product assembly, all while prioritizing quality assurance at every step of the process.
We understand that maintaining high standards is essential for our clients' success, so we implement rigorous testing and inspection protocols. By partnering with us, you'll benefit from our expertise and dedication to excellence. Together, we can develop custom solutions that enhance your product's reliability and performance, setting you apart in a competitive market. Let's innovate together!
Electronic manufacturing plays a pivotal role in today's tech-driven world, and we're committed to delivering top-notch solutions that cater to our clients' unique needs. We understand that an efficient supply chain is crucial for the success of any electronic project. That's why we streamline our processes, ensuring timely delivery and quality assurance at every stage.
By closely managing the product lifecycle, we help our clients maximize their return on investment. Our team collaborates with you from the initial concept to the final assembly, adapting to your requirements and market demands. Together, we can navigate the complexities of electronic manufacturing, ensuring your products stand out in a competitive landscape while maintaining high standards and reliability.
At the heart of our operations, printed circuit board (PCB) assembly services stand as a cornerstone for delivering high-quality electronic products. We understand that an efficient supply chain is essential for timely production, so we streamline every step, from sourcing components to final assembly. Our team meticulously assembles PCBs, ensuring each part meets rigorous standards.
Quality assurance is woven into our process; we perform thorough testing at multiple stages to catch any issues early on. By doing this, we not only enhance reliability but also maintain our commitment to excellence. When you choose our PCB assembly services, you're partnering with a team dedicated to precision and quality, ensuring your products stand out in the market.
Conformal coating services play a crucial role in protecting your printed circuit boards from environmental hazards. These coatings create a barrier against moisture, dust, and chemicals, enhancing the reliability and longevity of your electronics. We focus on delivering the conformal coating benefits that matter most, like improved performance and reduced risk of failure in harsh conditions.
Our team understands the various conformal coating applications, from consumer electronics to industrial equipment, ensuring we choose the right materials for your specific needs. By partnering with us, you'll gain access to advanced techniques and expertise that safeguard your investment. Let's work together to ensure your products stand up to the challenges they face in the real world.
Conformal coating services play a crucial role in protecting your printed circuit boards from environmental hazards. These coatings create a barrier against moisture, dust, and chemicals, enhancing the reliability and longevity of your electronics. We focus on delivering the conformal coating benefits that matter most, like improved performance and reduced risk of failure in harsh conditions.
Our team understands the various conformal coating applications, from consumer electronics to industrial equipment, ensuring we choose the right materials for your specific needs. By partnering with us, you'll gain access to advanced techniques and expertise that safeguard your investment. Let's work together to ensure your products stand up to the challenges they face in the real world.
Navigating obsolescence management is crucial for maintaining the longevity and relevance of your electronic products. We understand that every component has a technology lifecycle, and it's our responsibility to anticipate changes that may affect your product's performance. By implementing proactive strategies, we can identify potential obsolescence risks early on, allowing us to source alternative components or redesign solutions to extend product life.
Component sustainability is at the forefront of our approach, ensuring that we choose reliable, eco-friendly parts that meet your needs. Through continuous monitoring and adaptation, we'll help you stay ahead of market trends, ultimately safeguarding your investment and enhancing your product's competitiveness in an ever-evolving landscape. Let's work together to navigate these challenges effectively.
SisTech Manufacturing - Electronics manufacturer Bend, Oregon

Precision Electronic Manufacturing Services
Your Partner for High-Reliability PCB Assembly and Electronic Manufacturing
- Over 30 Years of High-Tech Assembly Experience
- ISO 9001:2015 Certified & ITAR Registered
- Quick-Turn Prototyping to High-Volume Production
Why Choose SisTech Manufacturing?
Choosing the right electronic manufacturing services provider is crucial for the success of your products.
At SisTech Manufacturing, we understand the importance of quality, reliability, and timely delivery.
Here’s why SisTech Manufacturing stands out as the preferred partner for businesses across the Pacific Northwest and beyond:
Unmatched
Expertise
-
Extensive Experience:
More than 130 years of combined experience in high-tech assembly, design review, purchasing, project management, and order fulfillment. Our leadership team has a proven track record working with both large corporations and rapidly growing startups. -
Highly Skilled Team:
Our team comprises experienced, highly skilled and certified professionals, including IPC-certified employees, ensuring expert handling of your projects. -
Industry Leadership:
Our management's background includes leadership roles at prominent companies like Vadatech Inc. and GE Fanuc Embedded Systems Group, bringing industry-leading expertise to SisTech.
Uncompromising
Quality
-
Certified Excellence:
ISO 9001:2015 certified, ITAR registered, and CMMC Level 1 Certified, demonstrating our commitment to the highest quality standards. -
Rigorous Processes:
We implement rigorous quality control processes at every stage of production, supported by state-of-the-art inspection equipment, including Mirtec 2D and 3D AOI and Nordson DAGE X-ray. -
Lifetime Warranty:
We stand behind our workmanship with a lifetime manufacturing warranty – if there's a manufacturing defect, we will fix it free of charge.
Advanced
Technology
-
State-of-the-Art Facility:
Our newly constructed facility in Bend, Oregon, houses the latest SMT, AOI, X-ray, and selective soldering equipment. We continuously invest in upgrading our technology to stay at the forefront of the industry. -
Complex Capabilities:
We handle complex assemblies with ease, including 01005 placement, BGA, microBGA, LGA, CSP, and PoP assembly. -
Leading Brands:
We utilize equipment from industry-leading brands such as Europlacer, ERSA, Mirtec, Nordson DAGE, Axxon Mycronic, and Aqueous Tech, ensuring precision and efficiency.
Customer-Focused
Partnership
-
Dedicated Support:
We are dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and building long-term partnerships. Your success is our priority. -
Proactive DFM:
We provide valuable Design for Manufacturing (DFM) feedback to improve yields, reduce costs, and enhance the overall manufacturability of your designs. We've been told no one else provides the level of feedback and DFM recommendations to increase yields on complex assemblies like we do. -
Tailored Solutions:
We offer flexible solutions tailored to your specific requirements, whether you need rapid prototyping, low-volume production, or high-volume manufacturing.
Our Electronic Manufacturing Services
SisTech Manufacturing offers a comprehensive suite of services to meet your electronic manufacturing needs, from initial design to final product delivery. We specialize in providing high-quality, reliable solutions for businesses, particularly those with complex projects and stringent quality requirements.
Core Services
Turnkey & Kitted Printed Circuit Board Assemblies
From prototype to high-volume production, we handle the entire process, including component procurement, assembly, testing, and even drop shipping. We manage the complexities of the supply chain so you can focus on your core business.
Conformal Coating
Protect your sensitive electronic assemblies from harsh environments, moisture, dust, and other contaminants with our in-house conformal coating services. This crucial step enhances product reliability and longevity.
Testing and Inspection
Ensure the highest quality and reliability with our comprehensive testing and inspection capabilities. We utilize advanced optical imaging (AOI), automated X-ray with X-Plane CT Scan technology, functional testing, and can accommodate custom fixtures or JTAG testing.
Design for Manufacturing (DFM)
Optimize your designs for manufacturability and cost-effectiveness with our expert DFM feedback. Our experienced engineers will review your designs and provide actionable recommendations to improve yields and reduce potential manufacturing challenges.
Obsolescence Management
Minimize the risks associated with component obsolescence with our proactive management program. We can monitor or check component lifecycles, identify potential EOL (End of Life) issues, and help you develop mitigation strategies.
Industries We Serve
SisTech Manufacturing has a proven track record of serving diverse industries with demanding requirements for quality, reliability, and precision. Our experience spans:
Aerospace
Manufacturing products to meet the stringent standards and specifications of the aerospace industry. Our team has decades of experience providing products for various aerospace applications.
Military
Years of experience manufacturing products for critical military applications. We understand the unique requirements of this sector and are committed to delivering reliable, high-performance solutions. We are capable of not only building and testing your products, but assisting with the layout, and the mechanical designs related to your project.
Embedded Systems
Expertise in assembling complex embedded electronics for a wide range of form factors, including i7 SBCs in VME, cPCI, and VPX formats. We have a proven track record with PMC, ATCA, uTCA, PCI, PCIe, mPCI, and others.
Energy
Providing rapid prototyping and manufacturing services for the solar and renewable energy sectors, helping companies bring innovative products to market quickly. We serve both large and small customers, local and national, throughout the industry.
Consumer Electronics
Delivering competitive pricing and superior quality for high-volume consumer products. We have proven to many of our customers that we can compete with, and often outperform, larger CMs and offshore manufacturers.
State-of-the-Art Capabilities
Our newly constructed facility in Bend, Oregon, is equipped with the latest technology to ensure precision, efficiency, and quality in every project.
We are committed to continuous improvement and invest heavily in advanced equipment and training.
Key Equipment Highlights
Europlacer SMT Pick-and-Place Machines (including new IINEO and Atom models)
These state-of-the-art machines provide high-speed, high-precision placement of components, including 01005, BGA, microBGA, LGA, CSP, and PoP. Each machine is capable of speeds up to 35,000 chips per hour placement rates.
ERSA Reflow Ovens (12-zone HotFlow models)
Our ERSA reflow ovens ensure consistent and reliable soldering of components to the PCB.
ERSA and Speedprint Screenprinters
These screenprinters provide accurate and repeatable solder paste application and inspection, a critical step in the SMT assembly process.
Mirtec 3D AOI Machines
Our Mirtec 3D AOI machines provide advanced optical inspection capabilities, detecting even the smallest defects and ensuring the highest quality standards.
Nordson DAGE Automatic X-ray with X-Plane CT Scan
Our X-ray inspection system allows us to visualize hidden solder joints and internal components, ensuring the integrity of complex assemblies.
ERSA Selective Solder Machines
For through-hole components and other specialized soldering needs, our ERSA selective solder machines provide precise and efficient soldering.
Onyx Precision Rework Station
For reworking and replacing leadless components and connectors.
Manufacturing Capabilities
- 17,000+ sq. ft., full-ESD manufacturing floor
- OMAP & PoP assembly
- 01005 Placement Capability
- BGA, microBGA, LGA, and CSP Placement
- Quick Turn Prototype Build to Large Volume Production
- RoHS Compliant (pB Free) and Leaded Capabilities
- X-Ray inspection services
Certifications & Compliance
Our commitment to quality and compliance is demonstrated through our numerous certifications and registrations:
ISO 9001:2015 Certified
This internationally recognized standard demonstrates our commitment to quality management systems and continuous improvement.
ITAR Registered
We are registered with the Defense Trade Controls Compliance (DTCC) pursuant to the International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR), allowing us to handle projects involving defense-related articles and services.
IPC-A-610 Certified
Our employees are certified to IPC-A-610, the industry standard for the acceptability of electronic assemblies.
IPC-7711/7721 Certified
Our team is also certified in the rework, modification, and repair of electronic assemblies.
J-STD-001 Certified
We adhere to the J-STD-001 standard for soldering requirements, ensuring high-quality solder connections.
CMMC Level 1 Complaint
We are Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) Level 1 compliant, demonstrating our commitment to protecting sensitive information.
What Our Clients Say
Frequently Asked Questions
We offer a full range of electronic manufacturing services, including turnkey and kitted PCB assembly, conformal coating, testing and inspection, design for manufacturing (DFM) feedback, obsolescence management, PCB layout, and mechanical design.
We have multiple SMT lines with advanced equipment from Europlacer, ERSA, Mirtec, and Nordson DAGE. We can handle everything from quick-turn prototypes to high-volume production runs. We currently have six SMT machines. Please contact us for our current capacity.
Yes, we are ITAR registered and ISO 9001:2015 certified. We also hold IPC-A-610, IPC-7711/7721, J-STD-001, and CMMC Level 1 certifications.
Yes, we have in-house conformal coating capabilities.
We offer advanced optical imaging (AOI), automated X-ray with X-Plane CT Scan technology, functional testing, JTAG testing, and custom fixture testing.
Yes, we have a robust counterfeit parts program to mitigate the risk of counterfeit components entering our supply chain. We source components from authorized distributors and implement strict inspection procedures.
We have experience and can accommodate building rigid, rigid-flex, and flex PCB assemblies; simple to 20+ layer HDI boards. Please contact us directly with your specific requirements. We are happy to discuss your project and determine if our capabilities will meet your needs.
Yes, we can conduct full lot tracking and traceability for all assemblies, ensuring complete visibility and accountability throughout the manufacturing process.
Ready to Discuss Your Project?
Contact SisTech Manufacturing today to learn how we can help you with your electronic manufacturing needs. Our experienced team is ready to provide a customized solution that meets your specific requirements. Request a free quote or call us at 877-792-2779.
- Phone: 877-792-2779 (PWB-ASSY)
- Address: 63068 Lower Meadow Drive, Bend, OR 97701

argos_summary: SisTech Manufacturing, a precision electronic manufacturing services provider based in Bend, Oregon, is expanding its capabilities in PCB assembly, conformal coating, and obsolescence management. With over 30 years of experience and certifications such as ISO 9001:2015 and ITAR registration, the company emphasizes quality through advanced testing and inspection techniques. Their commitment to innovation and sustainability positions them as a leader in the electronics manufacturing sector, catering to industries like aerospace and consumer electronics.
